techmeme.title: MLCommons, a nonprofit that helps companies measure the performance of their AI systems, announces the AILuminate benchmark to measure the safety of LLMs (Will Knight/Wired)
Atlanta-based Tractian, which offers sensors, software, and AI for industrial equipment monitoring and upkeep, raised a $120M Series C led by Sapphire Ventures (Chris Metinko/Crunchbase News)
Q&A with Samsara CEO Sanjit Biswas on how AI has changed the $30B company, which offers sensors, cameras, and software for managing vehicle fleets and equipment (Reed Albergotti/Semafor)
TikTok users shouldn't count on Trump to save the app, as his stance has been inconsistent and the app's existence brings little upside for him post-election (Dave Lee/Bloomberg)
David Sacks, Trump's AI and crypto czar, lacks deep ties to either industry but is a longtime critic of tech regulation, which investors view as more important (Bloomberg)
